item.title: UBS's Sweet Deal for Credit Suisse Is Looking Even Sweeter
item.description: UBS’s Sweet Deal for Credit Suisse Is Looking Even Sweeter UBS’s acquisition of Credit Suisse is looking like a better deal for UBS as the value of Credit Suisse’s assets has declined. UBS is expected to pay around $3.5 billion for Credit Suisse, which is a fraction of the $20 billion that Credit Suisse was worth just a few years ago.
